pinyin: Jie2 ke4 Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4

definition: Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The city became the capital of newly formed Czechoslovakia in 1918. Population, 1,189,828.
sentences.chinese: 1918年该城成为新形成的捷克斯洛伐克的首都。

sentences.english: As I've said, the revolutionary ethos in Czechoslovakia has long since vanished.
sentences.chinese: 正如我所说，革命气氛在捷克斯洛伐克早就消失了。

sentences.english: Undeterred, he continues, “My friend’s grandfather was from Czechoslovakia.
sentences.chinese: 我一个朋友的祖父是来自捷克斯洛伐克的。

sentences.english: After World War II, a reconstituted Czechoslovakia fell within the Soviet sphere of influence.
sentences.chinese: 二战后，重建后的捷克斯洛伐克陷入苏联的控制之下。
从而取代了捷克斯洛伐克克朗。

sentences.english: Her fiction and nonfiction appears in magazines in Slovakia and the Czech Republic.
sentences.chinese: 她的小说和写实文学刊登在捷克斯洛伐克的杂志上。

sentences.english: On October first, I shall have Czechslovakia where I want her.
sentences.chinese: 到十月一日，我将要让捷克斯洛伐克乖乖听我的话。

sentences.english: The Czechoslovak experiment was part of that global movement.
sentences.chinese: 捷克斯洛伐克的社会实验是全球社会运动的一部分。

definition: East Germany (1945-1990)/German Democratic Republic 德意志民主共和國|德意志民主共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2]
Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]
West Germany/German Federal Republic 德意志聯邦共和國|德意志联邦共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Lian2 bang1 Gong4 he2 guo2]
